body: Thanks, yes, I found that and have been modifying it to flip between 1.4.2, 1.4.3, and 1.5.3. So far I seem to be able to reproduce the minor differences in 100-node tests and I found the kube-apiserver.log that has the raw data in it. This is all good. I am waiting on a quota bump so I can run 1000-node tests.
